titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Parliament of Scotland, concerning the government of that kingdom, and the deposing of His Majesty from executing any power, untill he hath signed the propositions concerning religion and the Covenant. Whereunto is annexed, His Majesties desires to the Parliament of England: and the determination of both Housss [sic] thereupon.

publicationStmt.publisher: January, 5. 1647. Printed for generall satisfaction of the subjects of England,

notesStmt.note: Not in fact the Scottish Parliament's declaration, etc.; a narrative about it, etc.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: generall satisfaction of the subjects of England
